Issue.creator: adnanchoudhury
Issue.summary: Edit ledgerbenchmark tool to conform to test-writing specifications
Issue.description: To make the ledger benchmark tool to conform to test tool specification and make it easy to integrate with fabric test-framework: following things need to be done: Rename the ledgerbenchmark tool to agreed "LTE" (Ledger Traffic Engine). update the test driver script to allow individual tests to run, include readme.
